title: ion-tab-bar
body: The tab bar is a UI component that contains a set of
. A tab bar must be provided inside of

props.name: color
props.docs: The color to use from your application's color palette. Default options are: "primary", "secondary", "tertiary", "success", "warning", "danger", "light", "medium", and "dark". For more information on colors, see theming.

props.name: mode
props.docs: The mode determines which platform styles to use.

props.name: translucent
props.docs: If true, the tab bar will be translucent. Only applies when the mode is "ios" and the device supports backdrop-filter.

docs: The tab bar is a UI component that contains a set of [tab buttons](../tab-button). A tab bar must be provided inside of [tabs](../tabs) to communicate with each [tab](../tab).

docsTags.text: {"ios" | "md"} mode - The mode determines which platform styles to use.
docsTags.name: virtualProp
